First, I'd like to know how everyone else feels about the intercepting 
weapons rule (I wanted to have Rhesus's staff reflect weapons fire, 
but Hugar said I couldn't). Next this won't effect my voting, but when 
and if we ger a char limit will DAydreamer and Nightmenace count as 1 
or 2 chars. Next, I've been thinking that we should say that in this 
time Earth was emmiting some kind of transwarp pulse that attracted 
crashing ships through time and space to Earth assuming they were in 
Transwarp space. Next, I thought about sending a char to Cybertron 
(and by the way I liked Beast Machines), but I realized if a Pred or 
other member of an evil faction got there first the Pred fleet would 
come and destroy all the Maxis. On the other hand the opposite thing 
would happen if you sent a Maxi there. Either way would end the game. 
Also I can understand the no EMP rule, but if Transmutate had a sonic 
attack on the show and I'm bringing him back why should it have to 
change to plasma?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
>          Err.. Damn AOL making a send button over a reply button 
making me 
> send a blank email. Now then Dewboy to answer your question. No, I 
would not. 
> As by becoming a council member I would essence be becoming a GM. 
Everyone 
> would get a fair chance whether or not I liked them or didnt like 
them. 
> Although if someone decides to needlessly piss me off about some 
matter 
> within the RPG, such as how when me and you were making all those 
useless 
> OOCs I would give them 3 chances, one warning, a second warning, and 
then a 
> modration, and if they continue to do the same thing again I would 
set a 
> motion to have them booted from the RPG. 
> 
>          Also I would also like to let people no my motives for 
joining the 
> council. Although I have been in this RPG a short duration compared 
to some I 
> can see now that the people who participate are really treated like 
children 
> rather than adults. Seriously, no interception of weapons fire? Sure 
it got 
> bad a while back, but you know what people who are on the council 
should suck 
> it up and deal with the problem instead of just making a rule that 
cuts down 
> on gameplay. How could someone do that? Well one could give them a 
warning if 
> they were abusing the weapons fire interception, then if they 
persisted in 
> abusing the thing they could get moderated, and then if they 
continued, just 
> remove them from the RPG as apparently they don't wish to be fair. 
> 
>          What would happen to the charachters of the abusive person 
removed? 
> Either A, give them someone, B recruit someone to take them, or C 
Take 
> responsibility for them. Seriously it isnt that hard to control 
fifty 
> charachters I have about three times that in an EZBoard Beast Wars 
RPG. That 
> is because I control all the predacons as noone not even the other 
GM would 
> take any of them and the only other person who did have some has 
mysteriously 
> dissapeared, I control around 3/4ths of the maximals again because 
the otehr 
> GM is lazy, and I also control a whole slew of custom charachters 
either I 
> designed and made or someone else did and are no longer in the RPG.
> 
>          Also, I would like to help the RPG finally get off the god 
damn 
> planet Earth and back to Cybertron but not following the Beast 
Machines story 
> line. To me the thing was just too freakishly annoying and I believe 
only 
> some of the later first season was actually good. Earth has been 
overdone, 
> and the storyline this RPG was supposed to follow has been butchered 
and 
> destroyed and looks nothing like the story I saw. And as for more 
charachters 
> popping up from ships? Seriously do you know how unlikely it is that 
all 
> these ships would be hitting the same god damn planet? Who here 
thinks we 
> should move on to something other than past Earth or Earth in 
Particular?
> 
>          Also I find the whole no hostile drone rule ridiculous to 
even have 
> up there. Its BW people undestand there should be no drones at all 
really. 
> And as for offensive ones? Well, They should ask the council first 
as that 
> would be a logical idea. To make things short if im elected for 
council I am 
> going to try to change things Ill try to get RPers treated more as 
adults 
> rather then the imature kids that I feel they are being treated like 
now. Any 
> more questions? Comments?
